titleStmt.title: All glory be to God Thomas unworthy bishop of Bath and Wells, to the minister of ()̲̲̲̲̲̲̲ wisheth a multiplication of mercy, and peace, and love.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Bath and Wells. Bishop (1685-1690 : Ken)

notesStmt.note: Form letter to clergy of the diocese of Bath and Wells.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
